title: Summer Pasta with Burst Tomatoes
description: A fast weeknight pasta that uses sweet cherry tomatoes, basil, and garlic for a bright dinner.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Cook pasta in salted water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
Warm olive oil in a skillet and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add cherry tomatoes and red pepper flakes. Cook until tomatoes burst and release juices.
Toss cooked pasta into the skillet with 1/4 cup reserved pasta water and simmer to coat.
Fold in basil, season with salt and pepper, and finish with parmesan.
